channel.title: Super server recruitment! My soon to be best and maybe last server
channel.description:
Hey People
Since i may be going to advance stuff like C++ i want to code a massive server and even though i may stop making servers i still want to help the community,
If we all work hard we may complete an almost exact replica of RuneScape with: 60-100% of the minigames Make at least 20 of the quests Specials! Members server,items and even 20 member quests NPC's in there right spot The same xp rate Item prices and rarity the same like rs A powerful and updated alot client A webclient
Thank you people this may be my last server and i wish i can get all the support!
Jobs for the grab:
Client:
empty empty empty
Server:
Megapkscape Mostadaman Empty Empty
Creds will be given to all Including:
People we used tuts from Client Coders Moparscape for all the support its given me Rune-server (for tuts aswell) Dodian (for tuts too) Server coders Uploaders People who give us ideas
Thanks, Megapkscape
